title: Fort Larned National Historic Site: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations              Corp. Herron and the Medal of Honor   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:5 minutes, 33 seconds  Listen to a soldier who was stationed at Fort Larned recount the harrowing events that gained him our nation's highest military honor.               Flag Retreat with the 1st Infantry Division Band   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:3 minutes, 55 seconds  The 1st Infantry Division Band from Fort Riley came to Fort Larned and helped us celebrate our 50th anniversary as a unit of the National Park Service.  Their participation in the Flag Retreat Ceremony made it a truly memorable event.               A Frontier Christmas   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 43 seconds  Highlights from the fort's 2013 Christmas Open House.               Guardian of the Santa Fe Trail   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:11 minutes, 9 seconds  View our AV program for a brief history of Fort Larned and its relationship to the Santa Fe Trail.
